transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji sir?
Executive: Ji namaskar sir, Mr. Shubham Gaddi ji aap baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Haan ji, haan ji.
Executive: Ji, Shubham sir, main IndiaMART se Ankur Singh baat kar raha hun, aapka account manager. Kaise hain sir aap?
Customer: Main theek hun sir, aap kaise hain?
Executive: Bas main theek hun sir. Thank you.
Executive: Sir, main aapka jo account hai, kaise take care kar raha hun. Jaise ki abhi aapka jo catalog live hua hai, to aapne ek video meeting ke liye interest show kiya hai, theek hai? To kya aapne video meeting ke liye sir interest show kiya hai, Vandana Enterprises mein, right?
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To abhi aap online aa jayenge sir, main laptop ya PC pe, mobile pe. To main ek virtual meeting ke dwara aapko IndiaMART ki service ke bare mein aapko bataunga, services ko aapko kaise use karna hai.
Customer: Haan, bilkul sir, bilkul aa jayenge. Aap mere ko mail bhej dijiye sir, aap link please.
Executive: Ek minute, ek minute aap line pe rahiye sir, main aapko jo hai na yahan pe ek minute.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Aapki jo email ID hai sir, wo main kis email ID pe aapko link share karun? Ek bar aap mujhe share karenge? Main aapko ek bar
Customer: V A N D A N A
Executive: Ek minute rukiye.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ek minute rukiye sir, aap line pe rahiye.
Executive: Ek minute aap
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Vandana double A, vandana.enterprises25@gmail.com.
Customer: Wahi hai email ID jo maine IndiaMART se connect kiya hai, wo hi karo.
Executive: Bas karo aapne, unhone suna, [inaudible]
Customer: Nahi, ruko abhi link aayi, link mat check karo, join karo, join karo to bata yaar.
Executive: [inaudible]
Executive: Sir, maine hai na ek WhatsApp kiya hai aapko. Ek bar aap mujhe email ID share kijiye spell out karke sahi se, taki main aapse connect ho jaun.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan, dekhiye maine aapko ek WhatsApp kiya hai sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Haan, Vandana.
Executive: V A N D A N A A
Executive: Haan, ek bar aap WhatsApp kar dijiye sir mujhe, haan.
Customer: WhatsApp karunga.
Executive: Nahi nahi, haan maine WhatsApp pe A likh ke bheja hai sir aapko.
Customer: WhatsApp bheja kya? [inaudible]
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Haan ji.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Ankur Singh, aapka mail to ye aaya hai.
Executive: Haan, aapki email ID, haan aap mujhe apni email ID jo hai WhatsApp pe share kar dijiye spell out karke.
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Okay sir, ek minute aap line pe rahiye.
Executive: Aap mobile pe join karenge ya laptop PC pe karenge sir?
Customer: Laptop bhi hai sir, dono bhi hai sir.
Executive: Achha laptop pe hain aap, theek hai.
Executive: Dekhiye sir, abhi main aapko PNS number ke bare mein bataunga, jaise ki abhi aapka just catalog live hua hai. Aap apne mobile mein ek IndiaMART buyer number hai, 08048250260. Is number ko aap apne mobile mein IndiaMART buyer ke naam se save kar lijiye sir.
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Sir, join ho rahe hain sir, papa join ho rahe hain, mere papa ko sikhana hai ye sab kuch kya kya karte hain, kaise kaise karte hain.
Executive: Haan ji.
Customer: Mere papa ko sikhana hai sir, use my use my
Executive: Achha achha, aapka naam kya hai sir?
Customer: Mera naam Shubham hai, mere papa ka naam Shravan Kumar hai, allow.
Executive: Koi baat nahi, koi baat nahi. To sir, aap aur aapke jo father aap, aap dono hi online aa jaiye. Main dono ko hi iske bare mein
Customer: [inaudible]
Customer: Sir, hello.
Executive: Hello, haan ji sir.
Customer: Haan, maine dekh chuka hai, maine main dekh chuka hun sir, mere ko sara aata hai, IndiaMART problem nahi hai mere ko. Rizwan bhi hai mere pass connected already, camera off.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Aur
Executive: To
Customer: [inaudible]
Executive: Ek kam karta hun, main apna phone rakh deta hun, main video meet se hi baat karunga sir aapse. Main apna phone rakh deta hun, main video meet se baat kar raha hun aapse, theek hai sir? Meet se hi baat karoge na, best hai sir ye.
Executive: Haan, video meet se baat karunga.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer needs assistance with IndiaMART services.

- Wants a link for a video meeting.



Resolution:

- Executive shared email ID to send the link.

- Executive shared IndiaMART buyer number to save.

- Executive offered to explain services via video meet.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will connect via video meet.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- video meet, email id, pns number, catalog
